entries.title: Sexual abuse of female inmates plagues federal prisons, Senate report finds
entries.description: Sexual abuse of female inmates continues to plague federal prisons and accountability measures haven't contained the scourge of violence, according to a Senate report

entries.title: A look at the rise in migrants at the border as Title 42's future remains unclear
entries.description: ABC News' Matt Rivers spoke with "Start Here" about the rise in migrants looking to enter the U.S. as the future of Title 42 is in the air.

entries.title: Where winter storm is heading next
entries.description: A winter storm is pushing east, bringing heavy snow, ice and blizzard conditions to the north and a tornado threat to the south.

entries.title: Coast Guard searching for missing sailors headed to Florida
entries.description: The United States Coast Guard is looking for missing sailors who departed Cape May, New Jersey, late last month on their sailboat.

entries.title: Messi, Argentina beat Croatia 3-0 to reach World Cup final
entries.description: Lionel Messi is back in the World Cup final.

entries.title: Subaru recalls more than 270,000 SUVs due to a potential fire risk
entries.description: Subaru is recalling more than 270,000 SUVs due to a potential fire risk, with owners urged to park their cars outside until inspected and repaired.

entries.title: 2 Virginia Democrats join race for late Rep. McEachin's seat
entries.description: Two more state lawmakers have jumped into the crowded field of candidates seeking to replace the late Rep. A

entries.title: Jan. 6 select committee announces final public meeting Monday
entries.description: House select committee Chairman Bennie Thompson told reporters Tuesday that members will hold a final public meeting on Monday -- two days earlier than expected.

entries.title: WATCH:  Lost deer browses North Carolina supermarket aisles
entries.description: A lost deer was spotted roaming the aisles of a supermarket in Raleigh, North Carolina.

entries.title: WATCH:  Aurora illuminates snow-covered road in Alaska
entries.description: A motorist had an amazing view of an aurora illuminating the skies over an Alaskan road.

entries.title: US poised to approve Patriot missile battery for Ukraine
entries.description: U.S. officials say the Biden administration is poised to approve sending a Patriot missile battery to Ukraine, finally agreeing to an urgent request from Ukrainian leaders desperate for more robust weapons to shoot down incoming Russian fire

entries.title: First on ABC: Biden admin working on more fixes to Trump border wall construction
entries.description: The Biden administration will work to close gaps and fix environmental and other issues with the Trump-era border wall construction

entries.title: 89-year-old woman sexually assaulted, killed in '94; Vietnam vet now ID'd as killer
entries.description: In 1994, an 89-year-old woman was brutally beaten and killed in her Pompano Beach, Florida, home. Now a suspect has been identified.

entries.title: Mars rover captures 1st sound of dust devil on red planet
entries.description: A NASA rover on Mars by chance had its microphone on when a whirling tower of red dust passed overhead last year and caught the sound

entries.title: Merck, Moderna detail potential skin cancer vaccine progress
entries.description: Moderna’s stock soared Tuesday after the COVID-19 vaccine maker detailed progress in developing another potential preventive shot for a deadly form of skin cancer

entries.title: Supreme Court will review conviction in murder-for-hire case
entries.description: The Supreme Court has agreed to hear an appeal arising from a murder-for-hire ordered by the onetime leader of a violent international crime ring

entries.title: Scientific 'breakthrough' in nuclear fusion could launch new era of clean energy
entries.description: Scientists at the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory announced they successfully maintained a nuclear fusion reaction, which could launch a new phase of clean energy.

entries.title: Mississippi State college football coach Mike Leach dies after heart attack
entries.description: Mississippi State head football coach Mike Leach has died following a heart attack on Sunday. Leach was 61 years old.

entries.title: Meta says it will share software in attempt to combat terrorism, human trafficking
entries.description: Meta announced the release of new software to combat terrorism and human trafficking on Tuesday.

entries.title: Death toll in Jersey apartment fire rises to 7
entries.description: Police say the death toll in an explosion and fire at an apartment building on the English Channel Island of Jersey has risen from five to seven

entries.title: Inflation slowed in November, offering relief for consumers
entries.description: The inflation report continued a monthslong drop from the summer peak.

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried arrest live updates: FTX founder to appear in court in Bahamas
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the founder and former CEO of bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX, was arrested on Monday.

entries.title: Alabama women face trial for feeding, trapping stray cats
entries.description: Two Alabama women are preparing to stand trial in a city court where they're accused of committing misdemeanor violations by feeding and trapping stray cats

entries.title: Ram recalls 1.25M trucks; tailgates can open unexpectedly
entries.description: Stellantis is recalling about 1.25 million pickup trucks because the tailgates may not close completely and cargo could spill onto the road

entries.title: United Airlines orders 100 Boeing 787 Dreamliners, with options for 100 more
entries.description: United Airlines said Tuesday it planned to purchase 100 Boeing 787 Dreamliners, with options to buy an additional 100.

entries.title: What 'soft landing' means and the chances it will happen
entries.description: A soft landing is the best-of-all-worlds outcome for the economy.

entries.title: Biden to sign historic same-sex marriage bill at the White House
entries.description: Biden is hosting a celebration on the White House South Lawn with lawmakers and Cabinet members as the Respect for Marriage Act becomes law

entries.title: Islamic State group claims attack on hotel in Afghan capital
entries.description: The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for a coordinated attack on a hotel in Afghanistan’s capital

entries.title: Donors gather in Paris to get Ukraine though winter, bombing
entries.description: French President Emmanuel Macron is hosting an international conference to help Ukraine make it through winter

entries.title: US scientists set to announce fusion energy breakthrough
entries.description: Scientists Tuesday are expected to announce a major advance.

entries.title: Far-right murderer takes 2 prison guards hostage in Germany
entries.description: A German news agency is reporting that a convicted far-right murderer temporarily took two prison guards hostage in a prison in eastern Germany before he was overwhelmed by other guards

entries.title: New Zealand imposes lifetime ban on youth buying cigarettes
entries.description: New Zealand has passed into law a unique plan to phase out tobacco smoking.

entries.title: China students return home amid COVID travel spread fears
entries.description: Some Chinese universities say they will allow students to finish the semester from home in hopes of reducing the potential for a bigger COVID-19 outbreak during the January Lunar New Year travel rush

entries.title: White Florida officer acquitted of shoving of Black woman
entries.description: A South Florida jury has sided with a white Florida police officer accused of shoving a kneeling Black woman to the ground during a protest more than two years ago

entries.title: Famed Hollywood mountain lion captured after killing dog
entries.description: Wildlife officials say Southern California’s most famous mountain lion, P-22, has been captured in a Los Angeles neighborhood

entries.title: Latest Iowa bird flu cases push December total near 700,000
entries.description: Four new cases of bird flu at Iowa turkey farms in the past few days will push the number of birds slaughtered nationwide this month to limit the spread of the virus up to nearly 700,000

entries.title: Iowa judge blocks effort to ban most abortions in the state
entries.description: A state judge has blocked an effort to ban most abortions in Iowa by upholding a court decision made three years ago

entries.title: WATCH:  Herd of bison hold up traffic in Yellowstone
entries.description: A herd of snowy bison surrounded a bus inside Yellowstone National Park.

entries.title: WATCH:  Boater grabs kangaroo by the ears to save it from drowning
entries.description: TO THE RESCUE: Boaters in Australia spotted a kangaroo struggling in the water—so they grabbed the marsupial by the ears and pulled it safely ashore.

entries.title: Iran executes 2nd man amid protests
entries.description: Rahnavard was hung on charges of "waging war against God."

entries.title: FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried arrested in Bahamas on criminal charges, prosecutor says
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the embattled former CEO of cryptocurrency giant FTX, has been arrested in the Bahamas, the Bahamas Attorney General's Office said.

entries.title: Uvalde report reveals lack of active shooter training within sheriff's department
entries.description: Only 20% of the deputies in the Uvalde County Sheriff’s Office had received training on how to handle an active-shooter situation.

entries.title: Special counsel subpoenas secretaries of state in Georgia, New Mexico
entries.description: Special counsel Jack Smith has subpoenaed the secretary of state's offices in Georgia and New Mexico as part of his probe into efforts to overturn the 2020 election.
